com.pddstudio.networkutils.utils

Class ArpUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pddstudio.networkutils.utils.ArpUtils

  • public class ArpUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to retrieve information about the current ARP list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArpUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<ArpInfo> fetchArpList()
      Reads the current ARP list and returns a List of ArpInfo instances.

      Looks up the current ARP list and returns an ArpInfo instance for the given Mac-Address.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchArpList

        public static java.util.List<ArpInfo> fetchArpList()
        Reads the current ARP list and returns a List of ArpInfo instances.
        Returns:
        A list of ArpInfo instances.

      • ipAddressExist

        public static boolean ipAddressExist(java.lang.String ipAddress)
        Checks whether an IP-Address exists or not (in the ARP List)
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - - The IP-Address to check for.
        Returns:
        True if IP-Address exist, false if not.

      • macAddressExist

        public static boolean macAddressExist(java.lang.String macAddress)
        Checks whether an Mac-Adress exists or not (in the ARP List)
        Parameters:
        macAddress - - The Mac-Address to check for.
        Returns:
        True if Mac-Address exist, false if not.

      • getArpInfoForIpAddress

        public static ArpInfo getArpInfoForIpAddress(java.lang.String ipAddress)
        Looks up the current ARP list and returns an ArpInfo instance for the given IP-Address. If not matching entry was found this method will return null.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - - The IP-Address to lookup.
        Returns:
        An ArpInfo instance with the information for the given IP-Address.

      • getArpInfoForMacAddress

        public static ArpInfo getArpInfoForMacAddress(java.lang.String macAddress)
        Looks up the current ARP list and returns an ArpInfo instance for the given Mac-Address. If no matching entry was found this method will return null.
        Parameters:
        macAddress - - The Mac-Address to lookup.
        Returns:
        An ArpInfo instance with the information for the given Mac-Address.
